20101218020132.000|20101218020137.000|CCO|>> HEY, HAPPY FRIDAY.
20101218020137.000|20101218020142.000|CCO|ARE YOU FAMILIAR WITH THE 
20101218020142.000|20101218020144.000|CCO|CONCEPT OF A FRAPPE, NOT A 
20101218020144.000|20101218020146.000|CCO|FRAPPE LIKE A WHIPPED ICED 
20101218020146.000|20101218020148.000|CCO|BEVERAGE.
20101218020148.000|20101218020150.000|CCO|BUT A FRAP.
20101218020150.000|20101218020152.000|CCO|IT'S AN ACRONYM.
20101218020152.000|20101218020154.000|CCO|I DIDN'T GROW UP WITH PETS, I 
20101218020154.000|20101218020156.000|CCO|DIDN'T HAVE DOGS FOR EXAMPLE, 
20101218020156.000|20101218020158.000|CCO|BUT MY PARTNER SUZANNE AND I 
20101218020158.000|20101218020200.000|CCO|HAVE A DOG NOW.
20101218020200.000|20101218020202.000|CCO|WHEN WE FIRST GOT OUR DOG, WHEN 
20101218020202.000|20101218020203.667|CCO|HE WAS A PUPPY, HE WOULD ACT 
20101218020203.667|20101218020205.333|CCO|REALLY STRANGELY SOMETIMES.
20101218020205.333|20101218020207.000|CCO|HE WOULD ACT IN A WAY THAT WOULD
20101218020207.000|20101218020208.667|CCO|MAKE ME FEEL VERY STRANGE, 
20101218020208.667|20101218020210.333|CCO|SOMETHING THAT WEIRDED ME OUT 
20101218020210.333|20101218020212.000|CCO|THAT SEEMED QUITE ATYPICAL FOR 
20101218020212.000|20101218020214.500|CCO|ME, BUT ADMITTEDLY DIDN'T KNOW.
20101218020214.500|20101218020217.000|CCO|SHE WAS NOT AT ALL SURPRISED BY 
20101218020217.000|20101218020219.500|CCO|WHAT I SAW AS OUR PUPPY'S WACKY 
20101218020219.500|20101218020222.000|CCO|BEHAVIOR WHEN IT HAPPENED.
20101218020222.000|20101218020223.667|CCO|SHE TOLD ME IT WAS NO BIG DEAL, 
20101218020223.667|20101218020225.333|CCO|BUT IT WAS STRANGE.
20101218020225.333|20101218020227.000|CCO|THAT'S HIM IN HIS HALLOWEEN 
20101218020227.000|20101218020228.667|CCO|COSTUME WHEN HE WAS A PUPPY.
20101218020228.667|20101218020230.333|CCO|ESSENTIALLY HE WOULD JUST SORT 
20101218020230.333|20101218020232.000|CCO|OF TWEAK OUT, EVERYTHING WOULD 
20101218020232.000|20101218020234.500|CCO|BE FINE, THERE WOULD BE NO 
20101218020234.500|20101218020237.000|CCO|STRANGE EXTERNAL STIMULI, NO 
20101218020237.000|20101218020239.500|CCO|NOISES, NO PUTTING A HAT ON HIM 
20101218020239.500|20101218020242.000|CCO|LIKE IN THIS PICTURE.
20101218020242.000|20101218020244.500|CCO|NO OIL SMELLS, NOTHING THEY SAY 
20101218020244.500|20101218020247.000|CCO|CAN SCARE PUPPIES, NONE OF THAT,
20101218020247.000|20101218020249.500|CCO|OTHERWISE HE WAS NORMAL.
20101218020249.500|20101218020252.000|CCO|BUT HE WOULD GET TWEAKED, HE 
20101218020252.000|20101218020254.000|CCO|WOULD FLIP OVER ON HIS BACK,

20101218020258.000|20101218020300.000|CCO|AND OVER AND OVER AGAIN.
20101218020300.000|20101218020302.000|CCO|HE WOULD GET HIS TWEAK ON, HE 
20101218020302.000|20101218020304.000|CCO|WOULD FREAK OUT FOR A LITTLE 
20101218020304.000|20101218020306.000|CCO|WHILE INEXPLICABLY AND THEN HE 
20101218020306.000|20101218020308.000|CCO|WOULD BE FINE.
20101218020308.000|20101218020310.000|CCO|IT NEVER SEEMED UPSET BY IT.
20101218020310.000|20101218020312.000|CCO|HE WAS A HAPPY PUPPY.
20101218020312.000|20101218020314.000|CCO|IT WOULD LAST MAIN A MINUTE OR 
20101218020314.000|20101218020316.000|CCO|SO AND THEN HE WOULD BE SORT OF 
20101218020316.000|20101218020318.000|CCO|OUT OF BREATH AND WIDE EYED 
20101218020318.000|20101218020320.000|CCO|AFTERWARDS, BUT HAPPY, THIS WAS

20101218020322.000|20101218020324.000|CCO|APPARENTLY THIS IS WHAT'S KNOWN 
20101218020324.000|20101218020326.000|CCO|AS A FRAP.

20101218020328.000|20101218020330.000|CCO|PERIOD.
20101218020330.000|20101218020332.000|CCO|IT HAS A NAME, IT'S A THING THAT
20101218020332.000|20101218020334.500|CCO|DOGS DO.

20101218020337.000|20101218020339.500|CCO|IT'S A THING THAT DOGS DO, AND 
20101218020339.500|20101218020342.000|CCO|IT'S A THING THAT SENATORS DO,
